title: Page 8
content: And at last they came . Flying, fluttering down, All white in the city, All white iVthe town. They draped every steeple And tower in sight,. They dressed all the trees Against^Chrisfmas'night, And then covered the ground All over with white.

book.title: A Christmas Snowflake: A Rhyme for Children
book.description: 简介： 是一本关于圣诞节的英语儿童读物，是一本只有32页的短篇小说...
